Classes/Query/QueryType.html#/s:13Algoli.abstract: No query word is interpreted as a prefix. This option is not recommended.

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: Selects how the query words are interpreted:

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.name: typoTolerance
Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: This setting has four different options:

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.name: minWordSizefor1Typo
Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: The minimum number of characters in a query word to accept one typo in this word.

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: If set to false, disable typo-tolerance on numeric tokens (=numbers) in the query word. For example the query

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.name: ignorePlurals
Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: Consider singular and plurals forms alike to be a match without typo. For example, car and cars, or foot

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: Enable the advanced query syntax.

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: If set to false, this query will not use synonyms defined in configuration.

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.name: removeStopWords

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@AlgoliaSearch@o.name: disableExactOnAttributes

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: If set to true, the result hits will contain ranking information in _rankingInfo attribute.

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: Control the precision of a aroundLatLng query. In meter. For example if you set aroundPrecision=100, two

Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.name: minimumAroundRadius
Classes/Query.html#/s:13AlgoliaSearch5Qu.abstract: Define the minimum radius used for aroundLatLng or aroundLatLngViaIP when aroundRadius is not set. The

Classes/Query.html#/c:@M@AlgoliaSearch@o.name: insideBoundingBox
